report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-26724 Apple tvOS Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-26724 Apple tvOS Vulnerability
text: Apple tvOS could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an authentication issue in the AuthKit component. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to enable iCloud Photos without authentication.
